title: Here’s how Twitter’s Edit button will work… sort of
content:
On April Fool’s Day, Twitter announced it was working on an edit button. While at first looked like a joke, it’s not the case anymore. Apart from Twitter reconfirming it was working on this feature, at least two reverse engineers showed that this function is already being implemented. Here’s what we know so far about it.

more…

The post Here’s how Twitter’s Edit button will work… sort of appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Here's what we know so far about Twitter's upcoming edit button function, thanks to two reverse engineers.
